EmailTemplate.subject: NCS Seasonal Staff Stories - Get involved and win!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Share your NCS Summer Staff Stories with us and win!
1 £100 Amazon voucher for a blog/vlog entry, or
1 of ten £10 Amazon vouchers for a social media post
We're looking for motivated, inspiring and engaging seasonal staff members to help us promote our NCS roles and the rewarding experience that NCS provides. Whether you fancy yourself a wizard of the written form, a social medialite or just pretty darn nifty with a Nikon - we're giving you a bunch of ways to share your NCS experience with us this summer.
How to enter:
Entries can be in the form of blogs, vlogs, short videos, photos and quotes from the Summer 2016 programme - the most engaging and creative entries will win. Follow the steps below and read on for our competition terms and conditions - most importantly: under no circumstances are you to include photographs or names of any young people in the programme in your entries!
NCS Summer Staff Stories Competition - Basic T&Cs
You must be a NCS 2016 seasonal staff member with The Challenge this summer
Closing date for entries is midnight 02/09/2016
All safeguarding policies apply, so under no circumstances are there to be any photos or names of young people in the programme included in entries. The young people on the programme cannot be mentioned in any posts and cannot feature in any of the photographs including the background of any of the photographs. Failure to comply with this rule could result in The Challenge commencing its disciplinary procedure against you and may ultimately result in your dismissal. If you’re unsure, refer to the guidance in your role manual or speak to your Manager.
Full T&Cs available here
